channel.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
channel.description:
New:
Youtube video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TQhryYjlUpI
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2d4z83.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/mn6ko.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/w0l0eo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/6xywhz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/4hz21e.jpg[/img]
Vertices: 1251 Edges:2492 (may seem large but remember, on a simple cube you have 12 edges) Faces:1254 Time: ~6 hours
Old:
In development.
Well i have never done a character model before, and today (in the past eh, 4 hours) i created a basic framework, along with what is starting to be the hair. Remember that the framework of the model IS NOT the finished product, but just a guideline for me to work with.
Her name is Eve, do to the fact that she has no belly button (lolz) and she is my first character model, I need mucho criticism but please be nice. This is being modeled in blender, so some things (like the shadows in her hair) will be different.
I have already checked each and every face making sure that she has all facing in the correct manor, and i say again, please do not say "OMG HER HAIR IS MESSED UP" bc i can assure you it is not.
Details
Vertices:654 Edges:1243 (may seem large but remember, on a simple cube you have 12 edges) Faces:594 Time: ~4 hours
Pictures:
Angles + Perspective
http://i32.tinypic.com/esqjav.gif
Wireframe
http://i25.tinypic.com/220v2c.jpg
Hair @ Perspective + Wireframe
http://i26.tinypic.com/9tiyog.jpg
Youtube video with new stuff.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TQhryYjlUpI

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

For some reason the face slightly looks like a males face, but for some reason I can’t work out how you would be able to fix it.

Anyways, fantastic so far. Keep up the great work.

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Much better. could still use some re-structuring though.

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Much better, but you want to be able to tell where the elbow is. I don’t know maybe I’m thinking too muscular lol…but I think the forearm is a little bit bigger. Like something about the arms isn’t realistic, and I’m finding hard to place it, but I think it is the forearms… They seem too straight.

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @Wucas Wucas
item.description:
@Wucas wrote:

Is this better?

16ap0zt.jpg1024×522

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

For being new to character development, this is pretty good. I just cannot stand her arms tho. They are WAY to misshaped. The shouldermuscle/upper arm area makes it seem asthough she is muscular in the arms but also with a layer of fat to take away from the ‘chiseled’ look to the muscles. Try and redo the arms. Also, make the arms face straight out, or straight to the side. This is the most common way to model a character as it makes animating easier.

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)

item.description:

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @Wucas Wucas
item.description:
@Wucas wrote:

I dont see any characteristics of a man in there at all so idk why you called her a shemale =o.

Slimmed armed, fingers, legs, feet, long hair with a lot of detail, C size breasts, and a bubbled buttock.

Now if you know a guy with all those characteristics, forgive me for ever asking (and please do not post
a picture or description please)

Read full topic

item.title: (First Character Model) Eve (Development)
item.dc:creator: @Wucas Wucas
item.description:
@Wucas wrote:

Updated With Youtube Video

Old:

im not sure yet, since its my first model dealing with actual body parts, i guess i will go until
i cant go anymore with my amount of knowledge. Ill stop somewhere and get something for
runescape, along with a few animations hopefully. Maybe it can be an npc. I unno…,

Guess time will tell.

(P.S. I didnt name her, a friend did lol)

item.description:

Why name a character model? kinda creeperish… Anyways not bad, good for a start. How detailed are you going to make it? Like with individual toes and fingers? Or just a base.
